awd_titl_txt: Core Support of Water Science and Technology Board
awd_abstract_narration: This award provides the NSF share of the cost for support                       of the Water Science Technology Board which is the focal                        point for studies related to environmental engineering                          aspects of water management.  The Board's objective is to                       improve the scientific and technological basis for                              resolving important questions and issues relating in                            significant part to environmental engineering practice.                         An important function of the Board is to conduct workshops                      and conferences results of which are utilized in program                        planning.  It also serves as a coordinating mechanism for                       Federal agencies supporting research relating to the                            environmental and ocean systems program.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
